message: Let's make a deal. I think this is a fair split considering the circumstances.
Your previous offer wasn't quite fair considering the inflation.  This offer is better for both of us in the long run.
Bob, my offer is still the same. It seems like you're trying to take advantage of the situation, but the longer this goes on, the less there is for both of us.
Alice, let's be real. The value is diminishing with each round. A 50/50 split is the only fair solution at this point.
